LanguageData.Expedition33_ContinentObscur.label: Dark Continent
LanguageData.Expedition33_ContinentObscur.description: A landscape of sculpted mountains and valleys with strange flowers. The rock formations seem carved by an invisible hand, while ornate caves open in the hillsides. A perpetual mist gives this place an atmosphere of mystery and melancholy.\n\nBiome difficulty: Intermediate. A mysterious mist constantly envelops this territory, creating an atmosphere of mystery and melancholy.
